abstract: American military commanders are making sure that their troops know how to fight in conventional warfare, even after decade of counterinsurgency and counterterrorism campaigns; commanders envision future in which both types of warfare will have to be waged.
lead_paragraph: After 15 years of fighting terrorists, American troops are training for hybrid wars: large conventional battles combined with insurgencies and cyberthreats.

headline.main: The War of the Future? Picture Big Armies and Many Fronts
